profile.title: Profil ya mosaleli
profile.mustLogin: Esengeli okota liboso mpo na komona baparamɛtɛre.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Lakisa nsango ya ebandeli mpe oyo etolami
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekonde liboso ya kolongola na ndenge ya ndenge na yango
profile.noPrivateKey: Kle privé ezali te na appareil oyo mpo na kobimisa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Seta mot de passe mpo na kobomba backup na lolenge ya sécurité:
profile.backupDownloaded: Backup ya sécurité ekangami mpe ezuami.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tyá mot de passe ya backup oyo:
profile.importFailed: Libimisi ekokaki te (mot de passe ezali mabe to fichier ebebi).
profile.keysRotated: Kle ya sika esalemi mpe clé publique etii.
profile.importKey: Mema backup ya clé oyo ebombami
profile.keyDisclaimer: Klé privé na yo ebima te na appareil oyo. Bimisa copie oyo ezangami na mot de passe mpo na kozongisa yango na appareil mosusu.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tindela ba-appel mpe ba-sms oyo ekɔmi epayi ya téléphone to email oyo esilá ko verifié. Appel/SMS oyo ebimaka ekoki kolakisa numéro Chatforia na yo.

chat.selectPrompt: Pona chat to texte mpo na kobanda kosolola
